title: Divine Justice
description: 'Divine Justice' is the special prerogative of theology, but Martyr Murtada Motahhari is exceptional in that in this book he chooses to approach the subject from an altogether different perspective.He uses philosophical methods to solve the problems and questions that surround the issue of Divine Justice - questions that have best mankind from time immemorial. The fact that he has in some wise succeeded in this can be seen from the fact that his book has become a classic in contemporary Islamic literature.
author: Morteza Motahhari
